summary: Convert binary data to JSON by extracting content from various file formats such as CSV, HTML, PDF, etc.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the type of operation to perform, such as extracting from CSV, HTML, PDF, etc.

parameters.name: binaryPropertyName
parameters.description: The name of the input field containing the file data to be processed.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for processing the file data, such as delimiter and encoding.
